question: Taking a false oath
answer:
QUESTION

feel very sinful.I got caught in a hassel of things which i was not suppose to do.
by that my mother overhead me talking...late she asked me to put my hand on the quran and swear if this is true..i sweared and lied.aswell as swearing to allah subt'. i feel very sinful. i was praying with my mind being out of place.
what is the outcome of this what am i suppose to do?
how to ask forgiveness from swearing on the quran with your hand on it as well as swearing to allah subt' and lieing straight through.
please give me advice. how will i be punished?
what can i do to say sorry i did pray but i feel filthy from doing this.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful  

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

We are human and bound to commit errors. You had taken a false oath for which you have to repent. Beg forgiveness from Allah and surely he will forgive you. There is no need to become despondent. The concern in your heart for the sin you have committed is a sign of true Imaan and faith in your heart.

Continue to do good deeds and good deeds repels evil deeds. Be punctual upon your Salaah and reserve some time everyday for Zikr and Tilaawat (recitation) of the Quraan e Kareem. This will strengthen your Imaan and wipe away all the sins and mistakes you have committed.

And Allah knows best
